title: New York Firm Recalls Pork Sausage Products Due to Misbranding and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 9, 2015 Shirks Meats, a Dundee, N.Y. establishment, is recalling approximately 1,062 pounds of pork sausage product due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The product contains peanuts, a known...
